verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H6691>Zophar<s%> the <S%H5284>Naamathite<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Should not the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H1697>words<s%> be <S%H6030>answered<s%>? and should a <S%H376>man<s%> full of <S%H8193>talk<s%> be <S%H6663>justified<s%>?
Should your <S%H907>lies<s%> <S%H2790>make<s%> <S%H4962>men<s%> hold their <S%H2790>peace<s%>? and when you <S%H3932>mock<s%>, shall no man make you <S%H3637>ashamed<s%>?
For you have <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H3948>teaching<s%> is <S%H2134>pure<s%>, and I am <S%H1249>clean<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
<S%H199>But<s%> oh <S%H5414>that<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> would <S%H1696>speak<s%>, and <S%H6605>open<s%> his lips against <S%H8193>you<s%>;

And that he would <S%H5046>show<s%> you the <S%H8587>secrets<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, that they are <S%H3718>double<s%> to that which <S%H8454>is<s%>! <S%H3045>Know<s%> therefore that <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H5382>exacts<s%> of you less than your iniquity <S%H5771>deserves<s%>.
Can you by <S%H2714>searching<s%> find <S%H4672>out<s%> <S%H433>God<s%>? can you <S%H4672>find<s%> out the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> unto <S%H8503>perfection<s%>?
It is as <S%H1363>high<s%> as <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; what can you <S%H6466>do<s%>? <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than <S%H7585>hell<s%>; what can you <S%H3045>know<s%>?
The <S%H4055>measure<s%> there is <S%H752>longer<s%> than the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H7342>broader<s%> than the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.
If he cut <S%H2498>off<s%>, and shut <S%H5462>up<s%>, or gather <S%H6950>together<s%>, then who can hinder <S%H7725>him<s%>?
For he <S%H3045>knows<s%> <S%H7723>vain<s%> <S%H4962>men<s%>: he <S%H7200>sees<s%> <S%H205>wickedness<s%> <S%H995>also<s%>; will he not then consider it?
For <S%H5014>vain<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> would be <S%H3823>wise<s%>, though <S%H120>man<s%> be <S%H3205>born<s%> like a wild <S%H6501>ass<s%>'s <S%H5895>colt<s%>.
If you <S%H3559>prepare<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and <S%H6566>stretch<s%> out your hands toward <S%H3709>him<s%>;
If <S%H205>iniquity<s%> be in your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, put it far <S%H7368>away<s%>, and let not <S%H5766>wickedness<s%> <S%H7931>live<s%> in your <S%H168>tabernacles<s%>.
For then shall you lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> without <S%H3971>spot<s%>; <S%H3332>Yes<s%>, you shall be stedfast, and shall not <S%H3372>fear<s%>:
Because you shall <S%H7911>forget<s%> your <S%H5999>misery<s%>, and <S%H2142>remember<s%> it as <S%H4325>waters<s%> that pass <S%H5674>away<s%>:
And your <S%H2465>age<s%> shall be <S%H6965>clearer<s%> than the <S%H6672>noonday<s%>; you shall shine <S%H5774>forth<s%>, you shall be as the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.
And you shall be <S%H982>secure<s%>, because there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H8615>hope<s%>; <S%H2658>Yes<s%>, you shall dig about <S%H7901>you<s%>, and you shall take your rest in <S%H983>safety<s%>.
Also you shall lie <S%H7257>down<s%>, and none shall make you <S%H2729>afraid<s%>; <S%H7227>Yes<s%>, many shall make <S%H2470>suit<s%> unto <S%H6440>you<s%>.

But the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail<s%>, and they shall not <S%H6>escape<s%>, and their <S%H8615>hope<s%> shall be as the giving <S%H4646>up<s%> of the <S%H5315>Spirit<s%>.
